sentences.english: Schistosomes also possess what seems to be a cloak of invisibility: an unusual covering known as the tegument .
sentences.chinese: 血吸蟲還有一種如同隱形披風的特殊外衣，稱爲體壁。

sentences.english: Segmental vessels return blood to the dorsal vessel via the body wall or gut.
sentences.chinese: 經由體壁和內臟，部分的血管使血液返回背部血管。

sentences.english: Furthermore, the expression level of NlTgo was higher in ovary than that in integument.
sentences.chinese: 在卵巢中表達量最高，在體壁的表達量較低。
